text: Just found out there are tons of sick kids right now over seas that need help
wow that sounds like a problem
It is a huge problem to them but you and I do not have that problem huh?
actually i have a kid that is sick and overseas right now
What are you doing to help?
donating money to them
You know there is an organization I donate money also too.
tell me more?
It is called 'Save the Children'. It is an international organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
do they help kids in africa
all developing countries in the world
i notice they didnt send money to my child though, he is sick and overseas?
I am sure it will get to your child.
well maybe you could donate to my child. since you are so into helping out kids
It would be best to donate to a specialized organization to allocate the funds in a proper, efficient way so all children can get the maximum benefit from the money.
how do we do that
The research team here will collect all donations and send it to the Save the Children. This lump sum will be used to buy mass quantities of supplies at inexpensive prices.
how much will you donate
All of it
how much should i give?
I would give all you have. It woul dbe easy for you to get it back but for the children, this would be huge
